3) Working style (cadence, autonomy, stakeholder exposure)
- Cadence: lightweight but consistent—weekly planning + stakeholder sync, async updates in between; ad-hoc working sessions when decisions are needed.
- Autonomy: high. We’ll align on outcomes/constraints, then expect you to choose the path and drive execution.
- Stakeholder exposure: direct and frequent. You’ll work with partner teams and present progress/decisions; we optimize for crisp communication and fast alignment.
